Author: Infi, Anna
Name: Chat 2
Description:
Chat 2 is a complete rewrite of the in-game chat window as a plugin.
It supports:

- Unlimited tabs
- Tabs that always send to a certain channel
- More flexible filtering
- RGB channel colouring
- Completely variable font size
- Sidebar tabs
- Unread counts
- Emotes
- Screenshot mode (obfuscate names)
Punchline: Electric Boogaloo - ♪ A whole new chat, a new fantastic chat window ♪
Changelog:
**Added**
- Implement 24-hour clock timestamp option [default false]

**Fixes**
- Bozja/Eureka tells should work again
- Invites in Bozja/Eureka should work again
  - Added a notification that warns about fails duo missing player id
- Hide activity channels are now saved across sessions

**Misc**
- Loc updates
